abstract: Ecuador beat the United States, 1-0, in a friendly at Red Bull Arena.
snippet: Ecuador beat the United States, 1-0, in a friendly at Red Bull Arena.
lead_paragraph: For a night, it was Quito on the Passaic River, as an ocean of yellow-clad fans of Ecuador's national team were larger in number and louder in voice than fans of the United States among the 20,707 at Red Bull Arena on Tuesday. They did not go home disappointed. Read Jack Bell's article on the game here, and come back to comment.
